title: Workshop on Elementary Mathematics Education Program Evaluation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics teaching experience and foundational curriculum design knowledge
context.additional_context: A case-based practical course for in-service elementary mathematics teachers to strengthen their competency in evaluating corporate education programs.

learning_goals: A 10-step evaluation model can be applied to actual elementary mathematics education programs to analyze effectiveness, efficiency, and motivational levels.
Based on case study data, unbiased evaluation questions can be designed, and improvement directions for the program can be proposed.
In a blended learning environment, digital tools (tablets/laptops) can be utilized to visualize and share assessment results.

resources: Two case studies of elementary mathematics education programs in real-world corporate settings

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
